_aLatestUpdates._sText: In this update I have remade all soundtracks at this map to get smaller filesize (success) and I only remade the finish before entering the room and after entering the room. At before entering room I removed the stupid flammes, PlayerClip blocks and the tracks at where lasers moved (<- because the lasers hadn't pointed at the teleport anymore). At after entering the room I added Light System to get the party feeling and some spark-entities at the ground. Also I closed the room from the open-air. I hope the map is now better for you somehow.

_sText:
LEGO COURSE - ALEXXT

NOT RECOMMENDED FOR MONSTREUS BUNNYHOPPING SERVERS!

MiniGame

WALKTROUGH (v1)

Info

  • Map Version V2.0 (Original/Final)
  • 2 weeks of work
  • 4 secrets exist on the map
  • lego-themed map
  • spawn protection in 30sec
  • course difficulty: very hard
  • forced 50% chance on halfway the map
  • 250 points as reward
  • everyone can get the reward
  • 4 track previews on round start, full-length tracks play when reaching final room
  • few server commands are triggered on map load
  • party-mood in final room

The map requires a NoBlock-plugin to be active on server for multiplayer

Music

  • Flo Rida - Whistle (Pi Red BeatZ Bootleg) House Remix 2012
  • Taio Cruz (feat. Flo Rida) - Hangover (House Mix) [Mixed by DJ Nelsmann]
  • Maroon 5 - Payphone (Steven V & Alvo Remix)
  • Mike Candys ft. Patrick Miller & Evelyn - 2012 (If The World Would End) (DJ FM Bootleg Remix)

Enabled Commands Overview

A list of server commands which the map executes upon loading.
mp_round_restart_delay 4
mp_roundtime 9.0
mp_freezetime 2.0
sv_gravity 800
sv_enablebunnyhopping 1
sv_airaccelerate 1000

Special Thanks

  • BoHaRoX - Lego Textures
  • Jackmaster - Music help

Bug Reports

Please report all bugs on GameBanana comments page.

Changelog

To read all changes pls watch in Updates section



So much time passed since I uploaded this map. I hope anyone who ever played on it enjoyed as much as I enjoyed to do it before my life changed me the way I look at it today.


THIS IS MY LAST MG COURSE MAP

IF YOU FAIL, RINSE AND REPEAT!
